about_the_game:
RaceOnLife is a free multiplayer action-adventure game, offering a fully open world, advanced AI-driven NPCs, and unique gameplay experiences.

Step into the thrilling, ever-evolving world of racing with RaceOnLife. Set across a sprawling archipelago of lifelike tropical islands, the game combines exploration, competitive racing, and engaging story-driven missions in an immersive environment. The first island is yours to explore - a place filled with challenges, secrets, and the promise of real rewards.

What sets RaceOnLife apart? Multiplayer and fights, smart NPCs with whom you can interact through voice or text chat, giving you the power to influence missions and storyline progression. Whether it's negotiating for a mission, gathering information, or getting into unexpected confrontations, your interactions are dynamic and impactful, making every experience feel unique.

RaceOnLife also features full vehicle destructibility, with cars and motorcycles realistically taking damage from collisions, making the stakes of every race even higher. The game lets you experience the action in both first and third-person perspectives, giving you the flexibility to play the way you want. The in-game Workshop lets you customize and upgrade your vehicles, while the Inventory system keeps all your valuable assets organized.

Multiplayer modes bring a wide array of exciting events, from car football to demolition derby - with more modes being developed to keep the experience fresh and exciting. You can join tournaments, buy, sell, or rent cars, and even bet on events to show off your racing skills and outsmart your competition.

Players can also scan their own unique digital avatar into the game, bringing a personal touch to their experience. And it’s not just about racing - explore secret locations, enter buildings, and complete story missions to uncover hidden parts of the archipelago. With our unique procedural generation feature, you can enter any door, in the literal sense, discovering entirely new, dynamically created interiors, adding a whole new layer of depth and unpredictability to your exploration.

With stunning visuals, мultiplayer, smart AI, and an emphasis on exploration and creativity, RaceOnLife isn’t just a racing game - it’s an open-world adventure where your actions shape the story. Dive in, explore, race, and connect in this one-of-a-kind gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game does not carry negativity and is aimed only at friendship, acquaintances and entertainment. But we give players complete freedom of action - which may lead to violence in the game. Please refrain from this and get the most positive emotions from our game.

detailed_description:
RaceOnLife is a free multiplayer action-adventure game, offering a fully open world, advanced AI-driven NPCs, and unique gameplay experiences.

Step into the thrilling, ever-evolving world of racing with RaceOnLife. Set across a sprawling archipelago of lifelike tropical islands, the game combines exploration, competitive racing, and engaging story-driven missions in an immersive environment. The first island is yours to explore - a place filled with challenges, secrets, and the promise of real rewards.

What sets RaceOnLife apart? Multiplayer and fights, smart NPCs with whom you can interact through voice or text chat, giving you the power to influence missions and storyline progression. Whether it's negotiating for a mission, gathering information, or getting into unexpected confrontations, your interactions are dynamic and impactful, making every experience feel unique.

RaceOnLife also features full vehicle destructibility, with cars and motorcycles realistically taking damage from collisions, making the stakes of every race even higher. The game lets you experience the action in both first and third-person perspectives, giving you the flexibility to play the way you want. The in-game Workshop lets you customize and upgrade your vehicles, while the Inventory system keeps all your valuable assets organized.

Multiplayer modes bring a wide array of exciting events, from car football to demolition derby - with more modes being developed to keep the experience fresh and exciting. You can join tournaments, buy, sell, or rent cars, and even bet on events to show off your racing skills and outsmart your competition.

Players can also scan their own unique digital avatar into the game, bringing a personal touch to their experience. And it’s not just about racing - explore secret locations, enter buildings, and complete story missions to uncover hidden parts of the archipelago. With our unique procedural generation feature, you can enter any door, in the literal sense, discovering entirely new, dynamically created interiors, adding a whole new layer of depth and unpredictability to your exploration.

With stunning visuals, мultiplayer, smart AI, and an emphasis on exploration and creativity, RaceOnLife isn’t just a racing game - it’s an open-world adventure where your actions shape the story. Dive in, explore, race, and connect in this one-of-a-kind gaming experience.

movies.name: RaceOnLife: Join open world with us - "Part 1"
Talk to any passerby and complete unique missions - communicating with smart NPCs
Scan yourself and become the main character of the game, it's easy!

name: RaceOnLife

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 or NVIDIA GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5500XT or NVIDIA GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: RaceOnLife is a competitive online game where users interact with AI and play in a unified environment. Immerse yourself in the captivating, dynamically evolving world of tropical racing with RaceOnLife. Play the game for free in first and third person on a photorealistic archipelago.
